117a4(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mchis pa'i chos thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
117a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su mchis pa'i mi thong lags mas
117a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gnyis kyi chos sam/ gnyis
117a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs na/ de ltar dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las
117b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri rgyad stong ma pam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa/
117b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
117b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni zab lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang dag bla na mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni sems
117b4(khri brgyad stong pa): can yang mi dmigs la/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs pa dang / sems can rnams kyi tshod du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pas
117b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' ba bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' rten ma mchis pa la yal ga gel ba bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du/
117b6(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal ba lags so/ bcom ldan 'das
117b7(khri brgyad stong pa): thos bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi chang du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug cing
118a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rtogs nas kyang / sems can thams cad chags pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa de dag ni dga' ba byed pa yin no// rang
118a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor dper na mi zhig yal ga gel ba bskyed par 'dod la/ mi des yal gra gel ba de'i rtsa ba'ang mi shes/ yal ga'i mdo dang / lo ma dang / me tog kyang mi shes bzhin du des yal ga
118a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gel ba de'i sdong bu bskyed de/ bskyed nas kyang dus dus su srung zhing chus bran te/ rim gyis sdong bu de'i yal ga'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ lo ma'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ me tog
118a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ 'bras bu'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/ de sdong bu de'i lo ma rnams la spyod de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems
118a5(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de'ang rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur te/
118a6(khri brgyad stong pa): lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa'i lo ma lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams spyan mong gsum sa/
118a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mchog lnga phul brtan nas/ sems can rnams rgyal rigs shings la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sa la/
118b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rten pa lta bu ngag dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sAl chen po lta bung ba dang / rgyal chen bka'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye banas/ 'du shes meng 'du shes pa de smra
118b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ sems can da drun du thugs pa'i 'bras dum
118b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'god par byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'gyod par byed // dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed ngo // rang byang chub la
118b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'god par byed ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bstan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang lo ma
118b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang me tog dang / 'bras bu lta bur sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de la yon dbul ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/
118b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems can
118b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang mi dmigs shing / sems can du gdags pa'ang med la/ sems can de dag kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen pos/ gang dag gi ched du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i sems can nam/ sems can du gdags pa ci'ang 'di na mi dmigs so//
119a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
119a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
119a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i
119a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dman pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chud par 'gyur/
119a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chang par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba'i rmang du
119a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rang 'byor rang bzhin no// dede zhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan zin/ de badzin pa shegs pa nyid ma
119b1(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig par bya'o// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ga bya te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ man mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam zhugs na/ da
119b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing / rang
119b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar ngag 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ sems
119b4(khri brgyad stong pa): can dmyal ba'i bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/
119b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bya'o zhes gang smras pa ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems
119b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa'i de bzhin
119b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid de nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'phags pa thams cad gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis gzugs su gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid
120a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du gdags pa dang / de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa dang
120a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin nyid de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gdags pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/
120a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs
120a4(khri brgyad stong pa): des na de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
120a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen pos/ de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
120a6(khri brgyad stong pa): la bslabs na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par 'gyur zhing / dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyo las bdog /
120a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'ang shes par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba shes na/ smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sngon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs na/ dus gsum
120b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byung pa gyul/ sa sa shes sa / byang nams myas da A / nga rna
120b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can rnams kyi don byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su das par 'thuran ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spangs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'jud //
120b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnam theg pa gsum po dgu la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro// sems
120b4(khri brgyad stong pa): can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la bkod nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
120b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang phan yon thams cad mthong bas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing / gzhan yang bla na med//
120b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
120b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du #
121a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad snyas pa bzhin tu/ byang chub se p+tAH
121a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i
121a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par
121a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshang ba de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
121a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyad pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur
121a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/ ci sems can de dag bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa
121a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshang ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su
121b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / sems dang po bsrung ba'i byung chub sa/
121b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyan thos kyi thug pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa parna
121b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po des ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro
121b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin gyi/
121b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
121b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121b7(khri brgyad stong pa): po de dag gi bsod nams kyi bye ba 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
122a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi theg pa pa rnams lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dkar po rnam
122a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi tshad
122a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag tham
122a4(khri brgyad stong pa): cad rigs kyis la gnas par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar
122a5(khri brgyad stong pa): du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs
122a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi sa'i bar du zhugs par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar
122a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par
122b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor gal te stong /
122b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la zhugs par gyur kyang / de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni de bzhin gshegs
122b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro zhing / rgyu dang dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
122b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci zhig yid la bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
122b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ni ji lta bu zhig lags/ dmig
122b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni ci zhig lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/ rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/ mtshan nyid ni gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po
122b7(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'byung ba med pa'o// rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni
123a1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/ rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/ mtshan nyid ni gang lags zhes zer ba la/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmig
123a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni dngos po med pa'o// dbang byed pa ni dran pa'o// rnam pa ni zhi ba'o// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni de yin no// dbang
123a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa ni de yin no// rnam pa ni de yin no// mtshan nyid ni de yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam
123a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'on te gzugs kyang dngos po ma mchis shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ de bzhin du nang dang / phyi'i chos/
123a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med po bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
123a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stong pa nyid/
123a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin
123b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
123b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dka' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa dang po dang / mngon par shes pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / 'dus bya
123b3(khri brgyad stong pa): khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos
123b4(khri brgyad stong pa): po med do// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po mang ngo do// 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du'ang
123b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po meng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la ngo bo nyid med de/ rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
123b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la 'dus pa las byung ba'i /
123b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bo nyid med pa de dngos po med pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad mi stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad
124a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ni mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid snying bo nyid do// chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo
124a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
124a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/
124a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
124a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
124a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang / byams pa nas/ btang snyoms kyi
124a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mini skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nang stong pa nyid nas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
124b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa
124b2(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
124b3(khri brgyad stong pa): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
124b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos
124b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la'ang yongs su 'dris par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / sems
124b6(khri brgyad stong pa): can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
124b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam
125a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su 'dris par byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
125a2(khri brgyad stong pa): la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dres par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
125a3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par/
125a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed la/ byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa de ji srid du/
125a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang
125a6(khri brgyad stong pa): snying rje chen po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par mi byed do// rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub
125a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi lam yin te/ de byang chub kyi 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang
125b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i tshe de'i bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad mi skye ba'i spong bar
125b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par bltas na/ dngos po med par yang mi dmigs na/ dngos por lta ci smos
125b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor
125b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po'ang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med pa lta ci smos te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
125b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de sbyin pa de sbyin pa na rnam par mi rtog cing mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang
125b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do// len pa por yang rnam par mo rtog cing / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mo byed do// sbyin pa po/
125b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang rnam par mi rtog cing / mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do// byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs shing / mtshan mar mi byed la/
126a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du rnam par mi rtog cing /
126a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan mar mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang dngos po dang dngos po meng pa'i tshul du yid lo ma byed cing / rnam par mi rtog la/ yid la mi byed do// bla na med pa yang
126a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang dmigs par mi byed cing / mtshan mar mi byed do// gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba 'am
126a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtogs par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
126a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid de/ dngos po med pa de'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas shing / chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/ byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir ro//
126a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams chos rnam nyid dang bral ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos rnams ni
126a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams dang bral ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kho na chos rnams dang bral ba lags na/ bral ba'i chos kyis bral ba'i chos dngos po mchis pa 'am/ dngos po
126b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar rung skye/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos
126b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshal bar mi rung / dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung
126b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lags na/ de ltar ma 'tshal ba'i chos thams cad la dngos po mchis shes bgyi ba'am/ dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston par ga la 'gyur/
126b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/ dngos po yod pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston
126b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig lags la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bka' stsal pa
126b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan ma yin la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin
126b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin nyid de sems can de dag gis mi shes shing ma mthong bas/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi dngos po yod pa 'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston te/
127a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor yang sems can 'di dag ni phung po lnga po 'di dag la dngos por 'du shes shing / dngos po med par mi shes te/ ji ltar byas na dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur/
127a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig gu snyam nas/ de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir de ltar ston par byed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
127a3(khri brgyad stong pa): spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
127a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dngo bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom
127a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ de'i
127a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi spyod pa de gang la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
127a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye
127b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mched rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i chos rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa
127b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / nad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang
127b3(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po dang /
127b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
127b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes mang 'du shes med min skye mched stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes
127b6(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa dang / yang dag par spyod pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / dbang po lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / stobs lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /
127b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
128a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
128a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / sems
128a3(khri brgyad stong pa): can yongs su smin par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / spobs pa rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang yi ge bsgrub pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / yi ge rnams la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang /
128a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yi ge rnams med pa la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa ste/
128a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ci nas byang chub la gnyis su mi 'byed pa de ltar rjes su spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa
128a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
128a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas shes bya'o//
128b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya'o// rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i don rtogs pas na/ de'i phyir
128b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas shes bya'o// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
128b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyin/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de ni nga
128b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshig bla dgas so// de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor yang byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam gyi tshig bla dgas so//
128b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor yang byang chub kyi don ni yang dag pa'i don to// rab 'byor yang byang chub ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i
128b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor des na
128b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
129a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pas na de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
129a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
129a3(khri brgyad stong pa): la spyod pa lags na/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ nyams pa'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/
129a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems
129a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de ni/ chos gang yang bsags pa'i phyir
129a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ram/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag par bya ba'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs
129a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
129b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub ni bsags pa'i phyir ram/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag par bya/
129b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
129b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub chos gang la'ang dmigs pa'i
129b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod de ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
129b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ ji ltar nA nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
129b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad meng pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ dran pa te
129b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
130a1(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar na byang
130a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag la spyod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa 'jug pa lags/
130a3(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byung
130a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi spyod/
130a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
130a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par 'gyur ro//
130a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod la/ de bzhin du gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod
130b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / sems bskyed pa
130b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tha ma'i bar du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
130b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sprul to// rab 'byor gang dag gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis la rten pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bo zams
130b4(khri brgyad stong pa): cad de/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis la mi spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis
130b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
130b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnan par mi nus so// mi dge ba gang dag gis zil gyis gnan par gyur pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar 'gyur zhing / mi dge
130b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dag gis kyang 'phrog par 'gyur ro// de dag gis phrogs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba nas/ rnam
131a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
131a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
131a3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la spyod lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
131a4(khri brgyad stong pa): la spyod pa ma yin la/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas sam/
131a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas samadage ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
131a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid thob par mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
131a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyid pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
131b1(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rna/
131b2(khri brgyad stong pa): la bsnyen bkur byed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mnga' snga dang / dbyangs kyis bsrung ba'i snga dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i snga dang / nang du/
131b3(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i snga dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /
131b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su 'dris par byas nas yid kyi rjes su rtogs par byed la/
131b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bas shin tu rtog par byed cing / gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs thob nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa skyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed nas/ de tshe brjes nas kyang rnam pa
131b6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nams kyang chos de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag
131b7(khri brgyad stong pa): skyed par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su zin pas gzhan yang ngan song rnams dang mi khom pa rnams su mi skye zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang yongs su zin pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
132a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag gis kyang bsam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su
132a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bzung bas kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rnams dang / nyan thos gang dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa rnams dang nams kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
132a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams
132a5(khri brgyad stong pa): la'ang brten par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bstan bkur bya ba'i thabs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/
132a6(khri brgyad stong pa): drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
132a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur mi bgyid cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang mi skyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su ma zin pa'i byang/
132b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
132b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma
132b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
132b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang bskyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang brten du zin kyang / da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen dkur ba
132b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la ma brten par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas mang ngo //
132b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/ dge ba'i bshes
132b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyen rnams la brten par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis
133a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bskyed la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags/ bka'
133a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir te/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de ma thos la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ma bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
133a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang ma brten pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa gang dag dang ldan na/ byang
133a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyur pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
133a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
133a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa spyod pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / mar
133a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur pa rnams dang / mi ma yin du gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas/ de sbyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i
133b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes su mi 'gyur/ len pa po la'ang len pa pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/ sbyin pa po la'ang sbyin pa po'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar don chos thams
133b2(khri brgyad stong pa): cang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa dang / yongs su ma grub pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la'ang 'jug cing / chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu
133b3(khri brgyad stong pa): med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
133b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis rnam par 'phel na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
133b5(khri brgyad stong pa): su dag par byed la/ 'khor ba na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su longs spyod pa gang yin pa'i sbyin po'i 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems
133b6(khri brgyad stong pa): can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu
133b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsa drug pa'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sems dang po bskyad pa
134a1(khri brgyad stong pa): nas bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis rdul rnams de srung ste/ de 'dod chags kyi sems dang / zhe /
134a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gti mug dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ljang bya dang / byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos gang yang rung ba 'di lta ste/ ser sna dang / 'jal ba'i
134a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / dman pa'i sems dang / 'khrul pa'i sems dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dang / nga rgyal dang //
134a4(khri brgyad stong pa): brnyas pa dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
134a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma grub pa dang / mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos rnams
134a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/ chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med cing / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i
134a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
134b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa la spyod do// rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi nang yang yongs su dag par byed lta/ 'kho
134b2(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi ro ste/ gzhan du na sems can rjes su gzung ba dang / sems can la mi gnod pa dang / rnamapa
134b3(khri brgyad stong pa): can la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ tshul khrims kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa bdun
134b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'o// rade bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas mi gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po la snying po la'
134b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyar bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas 'thung
134b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis shes rab sgom par byed de/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar sems kyis
134b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar des chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing / chos thams cad ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma grub pa dang /
135a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/ chos thams cad byed pa la mthu med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan
135a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel na/ shes rab kyi pha
135a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ 'khor ba na
135a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi 'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re ste/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir
135a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rnam par 'phel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
135a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa rnams
135a7(khri brgyad stong pa): la snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/ rnam par smin pa'ang yongs su mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni thabs la mkhas pa
135b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang ldan/ thamam satan rnams dang / rgyu mang pab rnams dang / gzugs mang pa sgoms par 'as pa rnams rang gis sa d+ha kyis stong bar shes pa sa/ da pa
135b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sas mas pa dang lda sa rgya da byu pa spyong
135b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba snang ba nas badz+ra / zhabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang bsgom pas spong ba'i ma la spyod cang / rdzun du blags pa'i 'bras su 'ang zeb par mi byed do// ya
135b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sa 'ang da'i 'bras pa dang / sa pa da ma par byung // gyu sa tshos pams
135b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs kyi chos ngag la'ang spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las kyang 'da' ba'i phyir to/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma skye ba'i chos rnamapa po
135b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma 'byur ba yang byang las dang 'i sems da mas la byung ba ma sa
135b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang thob par mo 'gyur zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par mi 'gyur ro/
136a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngama' byang na 'di lta des chos thas nga nga ba rjod ba shes pas ma pas smra sa 'du du 'gyu
136a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ban dang / sa so yang dag par dzin pa na
136a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyam rgya rgyas sa 'dzis pa cwa tu da / chen po la'ang rnam par byung la/ ngas rgyas kyi mang yang yos su ga pa ma rgyas kyang / sems can rnams yongasas sa pa mabya
136a4(khri brgyad stong pa): du'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//
136a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
136a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos zab mo rnams la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa'ang len par ni
136a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyid pa ni/ blo'i mchog dang ldan pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
136a8(khri brgyad stong pa): bca' phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa na bcang las ma grol ba'i phyir po gsol pa com khyen 'dus ba nyid dadu la ma mo
136a9(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ dngos po meng ba las ma mamo'o// rab 'byor khyod 'di mang dung ma nying gang las mi gso lags shes par ba ni/ gzugs kyang ba nyid las mi gso'o// tshong da dang
136a10(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
136a11(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o// bsam gtan rnams dang /
136a12(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
136a13(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang
137a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chug
137a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mas bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byur ngan ma yin no gsol pa ma ldar 'das dbab po papa sa gam sa
137a3(khri brgyad stong pa): lagasasas/ ka' stsa smras ga byor danam ldan no/ sol pa/ sa dus la sa sas ca sa mang na sa
137a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs la/ dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par mi rtogs shing / dngas pos kyang dngos po mngon par tshogs pa ma lags
137b1(khri brgyad stong pa): narnamapapa 'dam margyas/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma rnam par ma 'gyur lagams sa/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mngon par rtobyas par yong pa / padu sa
137b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di bzhis ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na mngon par rtogs pa de lta bu zhig lags bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar dngos po'ang ma yin zhing / dngos po meng ba'ang
137b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin pa de ltar mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/ spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ gang la smos pa de dag med pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa yin no//
137b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

137b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o// gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal/

138a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su shes par bya ba yin zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spros pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

144b2(khri brgyad stong pa): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ji ltar byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs sa
144b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang ma lags/ bstan du'ang ma mchos/ thogs pa'ang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par ma gcig pa'i chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am/ 'jig par bgyid pas
144b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa ma lags shing / 'jig par bgyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams
144b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni/ chos gang yang sgrub pa ma lags shing / 'jig par bgyid pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab
144b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni chos gang gi sgrub pa 'am/ 'jig par byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor sems can gang
144b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag ni byang chub sgrub pa yin no zhes bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs gang
145a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
145a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
145a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bar gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gang yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang
145a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar rgya
145a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar drugang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / mam yang dag par ras
145a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhi gang me pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa'i chos deng
145a7(khri brgyad stong pa): da/ marnamapa mamamanang/ #/ 'dur ba/ mnas pa
145b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sngas can cad mad par margya cid tsam pa mnate/ rang gnang panan gagags pas sams can rnams cad gachud pa gyur/ nga sa paltung smra /
145b2(khri brgyad stong pa): don ngas par nam yin no// rab 'byor nga la byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad la'ang shes pa dang mthong byas bslab par bya'o// dal shes pa
145b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong bas ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs pas chos kha cig ni rtogs par bya/ chos kha cig ni rtogs par myi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byung chub pams
145b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs nas rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/ rtogs par mi bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
145b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni shes pa dang mthong bas rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rtogs
145b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
145b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes pabyin/ bcom ldan 'das
146a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags pa'i tsas 'dus pani gang lakus/ cos ldan 'das rnam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dus pazhes / den nga so pad /
146a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces dka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la nyan chos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams dang
146a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
146a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi ldan ldan pa'ang ma yin no// gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// the tsom dang
146a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
146a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//
146a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rig pa ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang /
146b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yangs// mam gathan ldan pa'i ba dang ldan pa'angs yin/ ldan pa'ang ma yin no// byams pa dang ldan 'das yin/ mi ldan pa 'dam 'anan/ du
146b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// btang snyoms dang ldan pa'angam yin/ mo ldan pa'ang ma yin no// 'du she
146b3(khri brgyad stong pa): med 'du shes med min mye mched kyi bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po'i bar dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa
146b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin no// 'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni gzugs can
146b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin zhing / bstan du med la/ thogs pa med cing / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// gzugs can ma yin pa de dag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang ldan/
146b6(khri brgyad stong pa): cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// bstan du med pa rnams ni bstan du med pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// thogs pa med pa rnams na
146b7(khri brgyad stong pa): thogs pa med pa dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams ni mtshan nyid gcig dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//
147a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid med pa rnams ni mtshan med ba dang lhan cig ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no// rab 'byor gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gzugs med cing
147a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan du med la/ thogs pa med pa ste/ de la des bslabs na chos gang gi mtshan nyid kyang mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
147a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
147a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi gyi/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yod kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par me bgyi/ gzugs dang / sku dang
147a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tri dang / ro dang / rag tu dang / chos kyi mtshan cing la bslab par me \u0f7fsa'i khams dang / chu'i rnams dang / ma'i khams dang / rlung gA khams dang / nam mkha'i khams
147a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa nas pa'i mas tham ma cing sa 'thab par ma rgyun pa' pha rol tu tshun pa'i chan nying la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i rnams kyas rab tu phyin pa dang /
147b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sngon 'grus kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang / byas su gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa dang / shes ba rol phyin pa ma smra
147b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa nyid rnamatshan nyid la bslab par bya gyi/ de bzhin du ngas pa mang shang ba cang stong pa nyid kyib kyis can nyid la smras pa par shA / bsas gtan dang po bya
147b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par mi bgyi/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ byams pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
147b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'du shes meng 'du shes meng min skye mched kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par
147b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
147b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la
147b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par mi 'gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa bana'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi 'gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa
148a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pana' mtshan tshad la bsgrub par / sangs rgyas kyi rnamam 'dres pa btsa kyi mtshan nyid la bam pa shA /
148a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par smi d+he/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi N+DI/ kun 'byung ba drung / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid sa
148a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par mi bgyi/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba 'am lcags su mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la
148a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par mi bgyi/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi zhing / 'du
148a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la ma bslabs par nyan thos dang /
148a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar ji ltar 'gyur lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur lags/
148a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ji ltar 'gyur lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo mar
148b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mas/ abya pa yang ca tho kyigs pa'/ sa/ nan thosas sa sa pa spyos du
148b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di gad ces ba 'phrul to// rab 'byor gal te chos 'ga' zhig gi mam nying
148b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yod par gyur na ni/ mtshan nyid de la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa/ gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa

148b6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang mtshan nyid med la/ da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid rnams la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa rnams la'ang bsgrub/
148b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid kyi khams de ni gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/
149a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan nyid
149a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis shing / mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
149a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus lags so//
149a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par mi nus la/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma
149a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhugs par yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus lags so// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par yang mngon par shes pa bskyed par mi nus la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen pos mngon par shes pa ma bskyed par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par mi nus lags so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
149a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par ma bgyis la/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma bgyis par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
149b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar mi nus lags so// chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar yang sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus la/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la'ang dgod par mi nus/ byer/

149b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid med pa la sgom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la
149b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// gsol
150a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sgom
150a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes/
150a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// mig la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rna ba dang / spu dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la sgom
150a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// gzugs la sgom pa rnam par 'dzag pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sgra dang / dri dpa
150a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// blang ba la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam
150a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o// dor ba la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// bsam gtan dang po la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
150a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sgom pa'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// byams pa la sgom pa rnam par 'dzin
150b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// nas

150b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
150b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mched la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom

150b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom
150b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rten
151a1(khri brgyad stong pa): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// bdag tu 'du shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab/
151a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / skye ba por 'du shes pa dang / shed las skyes par 'du shes pa dang / shed bur 'du shes
151a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa dang / byed du 'jug pa por 'du shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
151a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
151a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jog pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
151a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// stong
151a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
151b1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la sgom pa'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la sgom pa rnam par 'jig par/
151b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rtog pa
151b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcas pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o//
151b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa le sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa
151b5(khri brgyad stong pa): la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o//
151b6(khri brgyad stong pa): kun 'byung shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// 'gog pa shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
151b7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la sgom pa'o// lam shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
152a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// mi skye ba shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// chos shes pa la sgom pa rnam par
152a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// rjes su rtogs pa shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// kun rdzob shes pa la/
152a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// 'dris pa shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sgra ji bzhin pa/
152a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o//
152a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa
152a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
152a7(khri brgyad stong pa): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
152b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i stobs bcu la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom
152b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa ni
