321b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yin te
321b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
321b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang sa chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid
322a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
322a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags la/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnam/
322a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
322a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
322a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa lags te/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i yang gzham
322a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes kyi'ang gzhan/ 'du byed rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan mig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
322a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid
322b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi'ang gzhan/ me'i khams kyi'ang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi'ang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khams kyi'ang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid /
322b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta bar gyur pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ bsam gtan rnams kyi'ang gzhan
322b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chang med pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
322b4(khri brgyad stong pa): brgyad pa'i bar dag gi'ang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyi'ang gzhan/ mtshan ma med pa'i yang gzhan smon med pa'i yang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi'ang gzhan/ dngos po med pa'i
322b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag gi'ang gzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ mi 'jigs pa
322b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi'ang gzhan/ 'dus
322b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma byas kyi khams kyi chos kyang gzhan pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid gcig par ji ltar 'gyur lags/ ji ltar
323a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la gnas nas/ chos rnams tha dad du bgyid lags chos rnams tha
323a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod par yang rngo mi thogs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
323a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sa nas sar 'phar zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug pa lags/ byang
323a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la zhugs nas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' bar bgyid pa lags/ shin tu 'das nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
323a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse ba na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
323a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa la/ rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi nong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
323a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba sbun par bgyid pa lags dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang sems can
323b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rang
323b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod gang 'di sang du gal te khyod gang chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang lags pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de
323b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de nyid lags na/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams kyi chos
323b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nying mtshan gcig par ji ltar rigs shes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin snyam mam/ de bzhin
323b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'i bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid ma yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
323b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'o na ci stong pa nyid la gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar ram
323b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos shig dmigs su yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis 'di
324a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med la/ so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med do// de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
324a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bar dag med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma
324a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin la/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te/ 'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su/
324a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med la/ 'dus ma byas la sa gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor de lta bas na 'dus byas kyis khas gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin/
324a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i chos de gnyis ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
324a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gcig pa'o// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod par zad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin te/ don dam par ni lus kyi 'du byed dam/ dag
324a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed gang yang med la/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam pa dmigs su med de/
324b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag gi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin no// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
324b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dag kyang byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las don dam
324b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
324b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ de'i slad du chos gang ci'ang mi bgyid na/ ci'ang mi bgyid cing cung zad kyang ma mchis pa'i chos
324b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang /
324b6(khri brgyad stong pa): don mthun pa dang / don spyod pa dag gis sems can rnams kyi don kyang bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
324b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin pa ci'ang mi byed cing cung zad
325a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang mang ngo // rab 'byor gal te sems can 'di dag bdag nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid shes par gyur na ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid las
325a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can rnams kyang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral bar mdzad cing / bral nas kyang stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las thar par mdzad pa dang / de bzhin du sems can
325a3(khri brgyad stong pa): du'adu shes pa dang / byed pa por 'du shes pa'i bar dang / gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i bar dang / mig tu 'du shes pa dang / yid du 'du
325a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa'i bar dang / sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa'i bar dang / 'dus byas kyi khams su 'du shes pa dang bral bar mdzad cing
325a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bral nas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa de la 'god par mdzad pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig stong pa
325a6(khri brgyad stong pa): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de la 'du shes gang yin pa des stong ngo // rab 'byor sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa gzhan sprul na/ ci de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i dngos po
325a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ga' zhig yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ sprul pa la ni gang stong pa nyid mi lags pa'i rings pa 'ga' yang ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid ka
325b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ni ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ sprul pa la chos deganyis ni stong pa nyid kyis stong pa lags so//
325b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems 'di ni sprul pa'o// 'di na stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par spangs pa zhig yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das den
325b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la ni 'di ni sprul pa'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid do zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gnyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bka'
325b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sprul pa/ rab 'byor gang sprul pa ma yin pa'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa na gang yang med do// sprul pa gang
325b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te
325b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten pa'i chos de dag sprul pa lags na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos de dag 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
325b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
326a1(khri brgyad stong pa): #mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ de dag gi 'bras//
326a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bu gang lags pa dang / gang gis de dag gis gang zag tu mngon par rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
326a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang lags pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/ de skad
326a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ de la la ni nyan thos/
326a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o// la la ni nyon mongs
326a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pas sprul pa'o// la lan chos kyis sprul pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di spong ba zhes
326a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam
326b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / sangs rgyas kyis dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sum+b+ha/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
326b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed pa 'am/ bkag pa'i chos ga ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni sprul po'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shing ma sprul pa'i chos dgang lags/ bka' stsal
326b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rab 'byor gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de gang lagasabaka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ngan pa smra
326b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de dag ni ma sprul pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi
326b5(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yo la/ gnyis kyis kyang mi gos te/ gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i chos gang yang med do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las
326b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das pa'ang sprul pa lags par 'gyur ro// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan
326b7(khri brgyad stong pa): thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
327a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ ma nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de sad ces bka' stsa
327a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
327a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshal bar bgyin/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la phyis de dngos po med par 'gyur ba/
327a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yod dam/ rab 'byor 'di la dngos po'ang med/ dngos po med pa'ang med/ rang gi dngos po'ang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/ de la gang yang yongs su shes par bya
327a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par ga la 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med par bstan pa'i le'u sgra brgyad
327a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsa gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas bcom
327a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
327b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
327b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye
327b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos
327b4(khri brgyad stong pa): skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyu khams dang / mgo gi rnam par shes pa'o khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i kham
327b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dong rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams
327b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang
327b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
328a1(khri brgyad stong pa): lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi'adu byed rnams dang / rnam
328a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar
328a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par
328a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi gzugs can gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs can ma legs pa dang / bstan du mchis pa dang / bstan du ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa dang bcas
328a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus bgyis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
328a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang / bsten par bgyi ba dang / bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / ngan pa dang / gya nom pa dang / nang dang / phyi dang / mthong ba dang / zos pa dang /
328a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bye brag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'dod pa dang
328b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / 'dod chags dang /
328b2(khri brgyad stong pa): khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tsom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims bzang
328b3(khri brgyad stong pa): po dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / lo lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar
328b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par bgyi/ rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos
328b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyinyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon
328b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol
328b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
329a1(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas/ gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra/
329a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
329a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bgyi ba'i ming 'di ni dngos po dang /
329a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcas par dmigs/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa na
329a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste/ dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sem
329a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
329a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ dngos po ma mchis su lags na/ de'i ming de'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags te/ 'di lta ste/
329b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs shes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba ni dang /
329b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar du'ang mi tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rlung lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
329b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ma
329b4(khri brgyad stong pa): btags pa'o// 'ong lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
329b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
329b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs shes bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des ming de rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal
329b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar yang mi 'gyur la/ gzugs shes bgyi ba'i ming nges ni/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/ 'di lta ste/
330a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming du btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du
330a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des/ tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes shes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan
330a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar bgyi ming rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/ tshor
330a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes shes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi ba'i bar des ni
330a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid rig pa dang / rtogs pa dang / 'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang
330a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dang
330a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de la glo bur du ming btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
330b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan pa'i dang
330b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bo de dang / de la gzugs shes bya ba'i ming de la ma brten/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dengang de la 'di ni gzugs yin no// zhes bya bar jig de
330b3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam du sems sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa de ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba
330b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dngang
330b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar gyi ming de la ma brten/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/ tshor ba dang
330b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya ba'i bar dag la khyod ji ga de snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
330b7(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang / 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang /
331a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes/
331a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i bar de'ang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la glo bur du ming btags pa yin par 'di ltar rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ ming dang / brda dang /
331a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tha snyad dang / btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po de la nye bar 'dogs pa 'am/ tha snyad dam/ 'dogs pa 'am/ mngon par zhen pa yin nam/
331a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'das kyang / 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
331a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar de ni 'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming btags pa yin pa de ltar rig par
331a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// dbyams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di la 'ga' zhig 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid la/ de las gzhan pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po'i ming 'dogs
331a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sam 'du shes sam/ rjes su tha snyad 'dogs sam/ mngon par zhen par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang / 'di lta ste/
331b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs shes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes
331b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i bar 'di ni glo bur du ming btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams
331b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bgyi ba dang / 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
331b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang / 'du shes
331b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
331b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la/ gzugs shes bya bar ming dang / 'du
331b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa la/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/ btags pa tsam du zad
332a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so// byams pa 'o na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la/ tshor ba
332a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar ni/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhes
332a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de ji snyam du sems/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
332a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags pa tsam du zang ngam/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so// byams pa 'o na tshor ba dang / 'du shes
332a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod kyi ji ltar de ji snyam du sems/ de skad
332a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ming dang / 'du shes
332a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
332b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi bar du/ ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / za snyad tsam kho na lags sam/ de ltar na 'di lta ste/ ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang /
332b2(khri brgyad stong pa): btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
332b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems
332b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam
332b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kho na gang yin pa de la jig skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal
332b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa byams pa 'o na khyod 'di snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
332b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda ba dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la
333a1(khri brgyad stong pa): jig skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//
333a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'o na khyod 'di snyam du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/
333a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
333a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis chor
333a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
333a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes ngami smra'o// byams pa rnam pa
333a7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes mi smra'o//
333b1(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs mchis pa lags
333b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags/ de skad ces gso
333b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no//
333b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi/ don dam par
333b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nim yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan
333b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyings 'di ni don dam par ni brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings don dam par mchis su/
333b7(khri brgyad stong pa): lags na/ 'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bgyi ba'i bar glo bur du ming 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ don dam par mchis na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po
334a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming
334a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/ 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i
334a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dbyings shes bgyir mi rung lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la
334a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dris ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe
334a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par
334a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa'ang khyod kyis dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi dmigs
334a7(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
334b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba/
334b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du/ gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed
334b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma'i dngos po de gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa
334b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro// byams pa gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan
334b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na/ 'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
334b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin la/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams
334b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa ma yin/
335a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
335a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bgyi ba dang
335a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes shes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes po zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar dag/
335a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags/
335a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni rang dbang nyid dam
335a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yod pa nyid gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam pa
335a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ rnam par mi rtog pas
335b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de lnga lags so// byams pa de lta yin na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang lags/ 'di ltar gzugs shes
335b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du
335b3(khri brgyad stong pa): btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zang ngam/ rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do// de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur
335b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa na 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang
335b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de la yod pa gang yin/ gang yod pa de ni mi dmigs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal
335b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
335b7(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/
336a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces/
336a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
336a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang 'du
336a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta /
336a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni kun tu btags pa'i gzugs so// 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu btags pa'i tshor ba'o//
336a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu btags pa'i 'du shes so// 'ad ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so//
336a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnam so// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag
336b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ni kun tu btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu btag/
336b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi chos rnams so zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal/
336b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kun btags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rnam par btags
336b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
336b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/ rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
336b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa
336b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tha snyad la brten nas/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su rtogs pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i gzugs so// byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes
337a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar rgyu
337a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
337a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtogs pa 'di ni kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni kun tu btags
337a4(khri brgyad stong pa): la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar rnams so// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas mngon par brjod de/ gang
337a5(khri brgyad stong pa): la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
337a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so// 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o//
337a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so// 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni rnam par btags
337b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'don gnas pa nyid da
337b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang kun btags pa'i gzugs des rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / zer zug zer zug gi dus su po nyid med pa lo/
337b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang chos la bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
337b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
337b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag las/ rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/
337b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzas su mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing / don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po
337b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum
338a1(khri brgyad stong pa): po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni gang lags/ rdzas su mchis pa dag ni gang lags/ rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la rdzas su mchis
338a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
338a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa gang kun tu btags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o// rnam par btags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod/
338a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye
338a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bar blta bar bya'o// gang kun btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
338a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bar dag ni rdzas su med par blta bar bya'o// gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam
338a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtogs pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//
338b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
338b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin la/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
338b3(khri brgyad stong pa): la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis la/ de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du
338b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i bdags pa'ang mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes
338b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
338b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa de bcom ldan 'das/
338b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi ci la dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang /
339a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/
339a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bka' stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ kun btags/
339a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de la gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang
339a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam nyid gang yin pa de jig gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis gang kun
339a5(khri brgyad stong pa): btags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/
339a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngas 'di las dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal bar rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la
339a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brten nas gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de jig gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/
339b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun btags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing /
339b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i
339b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de las
339b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang chos nyid kyi
339b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de ji ga gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin
339b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de gzugs ma yin pa de yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyang sa
339b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas de las dgongs nas/ 'di lta ste/
340a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
340a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/
340a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing /
340a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs
340a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni dza lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan
340a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
340a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas/ 'di ltar bu ma'i lam du zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma/
340b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o// gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su
340b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o// gang gzugs spong ba'ang ma yin/ mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o//
340b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang ma yin/ mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i
340b4(khri brgyad stong pa): spong ba'o// gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du'ang mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o// gang gzugs spang ba'i phyir lam sgom
340b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang ma yin/ mi sgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
340b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
340b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'di lta bu yongs su 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / sgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las
341a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub
341a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo// mchog tu zab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
341a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
341a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/
341a5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
341a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan
341a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/ 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan
341b1(khri brgyad stong pa): las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/
341b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/ 'khor du yongs su mi gtong na/ de 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas
341b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su
341b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi gtong na/ 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su gtang bar mi 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu
341b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/
341b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de 'khor ba las 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/
341b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur/
342a1(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rig pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang yongs su mi gtong la/ mya
342a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
342a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas/ 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de
342a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te blang ba ma mchis
342a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ji ltar ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe 'am/ mi len to zhes mi smra'o// byams pa 'on
342a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa/ thabs la mkhas pas
342a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
342b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// de skang
342b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus
342b3(khri brgyad stong pa): papar ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzugs pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed
342b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
342b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos de dag dang / stong pa nyid de'i dngos po med pa gang yin pa dang / spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dus par blta'o// de skad ces
342b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das labyang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos chos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan
342b7(khri brgyad stong pa): du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'jig rten 'di ni khams
343a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sna tshogs pa/ khams dum pa ste/ khams sna tshogs pa/ khams dum pa'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang / rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/
343a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa gang thog ma nyid nas babang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dam
343a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid thob la/ de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman
343a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid thob la/ dman par shes nas/ de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/ de'i 'og tu bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing / bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu'ang yod do//
343a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi rigs rnam pa
343a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum pa gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang / skye ba ma mchis pa ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ bsgrub pa nyid
343a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i skye ba lags par ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis
343b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur bar ning mi 'dogs kyis/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang / yongs su bsngos pa'o zhes nga 'dogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan/
343b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bya brag nyid thes
343b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
343b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags/ che ba'i lhags pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin
343b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag
343b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas de la ma chag
343b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
344a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par lta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sem
344a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar
344a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mang du byung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
344a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa
344a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor bzhi po de dag yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston
344a6(khri brgyad stong pa): cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer gzhag ste/ sgrib pa nyon mongs rngom bsal nas rab zhibs// 'gro don mngon
344a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhugs nges pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin// gang la dpa' rnams spyod pa de ni mnyan par gyis// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed 'bab pa dag/ ma dros gnas pa'i klu dbang klu bdag ra
344b1(khri brgyad stong pa): brten nas/ me tog 'bras bu sprin dang nags tshal skyed byed de// de ni klu bdag de yi dpal gyi mthu yin no// rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji skad chos ston dang // 'chad cing rigs pa
344b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag dang ldan par brjod pa dang // bde ba mchog dang byeng dang de yi 'bras thob pa// de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i smos pa'i mthu// ci'i phyir zhe na rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa/
344b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslabs shing // mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed de// sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs dang mthus ma yin// gang la shes rab
344b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs shing // byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs// de skad thos nas rmongs pa med cing mi skrag pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde
344b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs shes rab spyod// gzugs meng tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med// de la rnam shes gnas kyi rdul tsam mi rnyed pa// de ni chos kun mi gnas gnas med rgyu ba ste// yongs
344b6(khri brgyad stong pa): su gzung med bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub thob// de nas kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs phyi rol gyi// phung po rnam par 'jig cing shes la dmigs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang
344b7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig de ltar chos shes shing / mya ngan 'das par mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gzhan yang shes rab 'di ni gang yin gang gi phyir// gang las 'byung zhes chos 'di thams cad stong
345a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par rtog/ nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med cing sgras med pa// byang chub sems dpa' don byang chub tu ba yin// gal te ma shes bzhin du gzugs dang 'a
345a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por spyod byed cing // phung 'ang stong zhes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ni// mtshan mar spyod de skye med gnas la reg ma yin// gzugs
345a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tshor ba dang ni 'du shes sems pa dang // rnam par shes pa mi spyod gnas med gang rgyu ba// shes rab bstan de spyod ces khas len mo byed do// skye med blo yis zhi ba'i ting 'dzin
345a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog la reg/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rab zhi 'dir gnas te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan yin// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag ce'am langs shes
345a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rlom sems med// ci phyir zhen don chos rang btsun yongs shes sbyor// de ltar spyod na ba gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ni sbyong dang po spyod rab tu shes pas na// chom sa
345a6(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya/ byis pa rnams kyis de brtags med dang
345a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yod par byed// yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di shes de nges 'byung // gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'dir shes shing /
345b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la// sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar ga spyod pa// de ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// dge pa'i du shes dang ldan
345b2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skrag par yongs mi 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa// de ni sdong som gtang chus
345b3(khri brgyad stong pa): reg zhig pa bzhin// ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na// chags pa'i byed pa kun la chags pa gcod 'dod pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg/
345b4(khri brgyad stong pa): des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i maung 'thob bo// ci'i phyir de ni sems dpa' che zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ni sems can phung po chen po'i mchog 'gyur dang // sems can khams kyi
345b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lta gyur chen po gcod pa ste// de phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// gtong ba che dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen mchog la zhugs pa dang /
345b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bdud kyi g.yo sgyu gdul phyir go cha che bgos pa// de yi phyir na sems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te// skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba
345b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gcod par byed// sgyu ma ci 'dra de 'drar sems can de kun shes// 'gro kun sprul pa 'dra bar de la 'jigs pa med// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba dang ni sems pa dang /
346a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa min// de ltar byang chub 'jug cing zhum pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog
346a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ci phyir 'di ni byang chub theg chen bya zhe na// de ni gang zhon sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo// theg pa 'di ni gzhal med khang chen nam mkha' mtshungs// dga' skying bde ba mngon par
346a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thob byed theg pa mchog/ zhon nas gang zhig phyogs su 'gro ba de mi dmigs// mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs na 'gro mi dmigs// dper na mi shi yi 'gro rgyu mi dmigs bzhin//
346a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dephyir nga ni mya ngan 'das shes brjod pa yin// skyon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dngadang ltar yang // byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste// gang dag de ni 'dus byas ma mi/
346a5(khri brgyad stong pa): spos med de// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang tshe gang dus na// skye ba med par bsams te de ltar spyod byed cing // snying rje chen pa
346a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes skyed// sdug bsngal spyad par bya zhing 'gro
346a7(khri brgyad stong pa): don bya snyam ste// bdag dang sems can yongs chog byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'don shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod ma yin// bdag ci 'dra bde 'drar sems can thams cad shes// sem
346b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad ci 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang skye ba gnyis kar mi rtog pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed yongs
346b2(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod pa// skye ba kun las yang dag 'das shing thal byas nas// 'chi med ye shes mchog thob de la gzhal med de// de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya// byang chub sems
346b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' gang zhig ngogs med 'di ltar spyod// de ni thabs dang shes rab gnas par shes par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i
346b4(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod mchog yin// gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor la mi gnas shing // gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la// rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid mi gnas te/
346b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid dang // 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcom
346b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sa la mi gnas shing // rang rgyal sa dang sangs rgyas sa la mi gnas te// ji ltar ston pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing // de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas gnas med rgyu//
346b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas shes gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang /
347a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas dang chos rgyal 'gyur bar byed 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la ma brten thob par mi nus te// dper na pha rol tshu rol 'gro ngogs mi mthong bzhin/
347a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhig chos nyid 'gro dang gang bshad thos pa dang // 'bras bu thob dang rang rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal bya mya ngan 'das pa gang thob pa// de dag thams cad de
347a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pas sras su gzigs// gang zag bzhi po de dag de la mi skrag ste// rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom dri ma bsal cing som nyi spangs pa
347a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su smin byas bzhi pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de ltar spyod pa ni// dgra bcoms la mo slob rkyen rtogs sngar mi slob// thams cad
347a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos la slob// bslab pa mi slob tshul gyis slob pa de bslab yin// gzugs 'phel ba dang yongs 'bri yongs su gzung phyir min// sna tshogs chos rnams
347a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su gzung phyir bslab pa min// de ltar slob pa thams cad mkhyen nyid yongs 'dzin cing // nges 'byung 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i bslab pa yin// gzugs ni shes rab ma yin
347a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs la shes rab med // tshar dang 'du shes sems dpa' dag dang rnam par shes// 'di dag shes rab ma yin de la shes rab mang // de dag nam mkha'i khams mtshungs za dang
347b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yong ma yin// dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de yi pa mtha' med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang ba mtha' med// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang ba man+ta
347b2(khri brgyad stong pa): med 'jig rten mkhas pa'i shes rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags// rnam shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro/
347b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag de la 'du shes bral ba rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te gad+hA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal bzhugs te// ston pa 'di yis sems can zhes
347b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'i sgra brjod kyang // gzong nas dag pa'i sems can skye ba ga la yod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang tshang ni shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang // mthun
347b5(khri brgyad stong pa): par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis// ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes// nga la lung bstan ces rgyal ba de skad gsungs// shes rab pha rol phyin gang mgon po
347b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams spyod pa// 'di ni gang zhig rtags 'dzin kun tu chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// la las
347b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde gshegs mchod rten gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis bye ba
348a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phrag stong zhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag gzung zhing rnams bya ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyid 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan
348a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang / byug pas dus gsum bskal pa'am de bas lhag mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba/ bde bar gshegs
348a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i yum 'di glegs bam bris byas te/ 'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti stang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin/
348a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di rig sngags che// sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal
348a5(khri brgyad stong pa): po bla medar gyur// gang dag phan dang snying brtser bcas pa spyod spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa/
348a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa la gnas nas 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa rnying nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par bskyed// pha rol phyin lnga
348a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub yon tan ji snyed po// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor lo sbyar rgyal lam gang nas ni tshig 'gro ba// lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs
348b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sum gang nas rgyal can shes rab pa ram phyin 'ad // datsang nas na yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur/ rgyal bas bcu byin rdzo yongs rjes lan gsol pa// sa d+hA dzAH/
348b2(khri brgyad stong pa): klung ga bye snyeng sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byung bur bltams gyur kyang // bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci srang cen sku gdung mi gus
348b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod par 'gyur// dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro kun thob ltar// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin
348b4(khri brgyad stong pa): la brten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin tang med// gab tshe gang du stsal ba de ni phyag bgyi 'os// de phyung gyur kyang gab rtse la ni dga' bgyid de// yon tan de dag nor chu
348b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rin chen de yi lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis// rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod pas brnyes// de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan
348b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin 'tshal nges// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags// sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de
348b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin no// dge chos chud mi gsan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ston par byed// dper na 'dzam bu gling na shing mang bye ba stong /
349a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i gzugs ldan pa// grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par// grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag
349a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yod ma yin// de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin pas yongs su bsngos gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsngos
349a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byas na// byang chub bsngos pas drug kun 'dir ni tshul gcig gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gal te yongs su mi shes bzhin// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba sems dang rnam par
349a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes/ mi rtag yongs su brjod pa chos la spyod pa ste// mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams chung gson mi byed do// gang la gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes mi dmigs shing // rnam
349a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa dag dang sems pa mi dmigs la// chos kun skye mang stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyeng zhing
349a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed sems can la las dgra bcom nyid btul bas// gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// sems can gzhan la glegs byin bsod nams byung
349a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'phags// ci phyir zhen sgra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed// de thos nyan thos byur du rnam par grol lo reg/ rang rgyal
349b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg// lcug ma med par snod 'byung 'jig rten yod mang na// de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bug la 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung
349b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten yod med na// 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'byed// de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du
349b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas pa'i shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mtsho la bdag med gyur pa na// chu klung 'dzam bu'i gling
349b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dir 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde
349b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di/
349b6(khri brgyad stong pa): na srin bu me khyer ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams phyung ba bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste// me khyer tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod//
349b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // sdom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa yang // byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang sems gcig la// nyan thos tshogs
350a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phong // 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang // zhing mang mtha' yas dag na bye stong gang bzhugs dang // gang ya
350a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston to// dang po byang chub mchog tu sems skyeng bskyed pa nas// rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam
350a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chos zad kyi dus// de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas gang dag dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang
350a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa// bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang byed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyu phyir thams cad sngo// yongs bsngo gal te sems dang 'du shes
350a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas byed cing // byang chub 'du shes yongs bsngo sems can 'du shes pa// 'du shes dang ni lta bas sems gsum ldan par gnas// dmigs pa yod pas yongs su bsngos par chung ma yin//
350a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te 'di ltar chos rnams 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu shes pas yongs su
350a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsdom yin// ci sa mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yon// ji ltar drug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas pabang zab// dkar po'i chos la dmigs
