350b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo ba bslab bya ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge bar rab mkhyen pa'i// rnam pa gang dang 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yin la/
350b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo// de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongs su sngo byed na// drug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra// de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bo 'jig rten
350b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de yis zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams// lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur
350b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gyur na// de dag mig rnyed gyur cing 'di dag
350b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ming thob bo// dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// mig ma byas pas de tshe rngan pa mi thob bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos// shes rab rnam
350b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par zhig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro// nam mkhar gang mi gnas pa co yang med pa bzhin// gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes ra
350b7(khri brgyad stong pa): srung bya zhing // sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang sgrol sems// sems can 'du shes yongs brtags byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'don shes rab rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog
351a1(khri brgyad stong pa): min byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon spyad spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol phyin 'dir spyad pa mkhas pa som nyi med/ thos ma thag tu deni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed//
351a2(khri brgyad stong pa): deyi byang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon spyod tshen sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin la ma dad na// de ni dper na tshong pa rin chen gling
351a3(khri brgyad stong pa): song la// zong rnams zad par byas nas phyir ldog byed dang mtshungs// de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yum 'dir dang par gyis/ thos nas
351a4(khri brgyad stong pa): blo chung gang zhig 'di ni spong byed pa// de spang nas ni mnar med 'gro ste skyabs mang 'gyur// gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu'i dag par rig par bya// 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen cing
351a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag pas gzugs kyang dag/ nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing gcad med dbye ba med// dpa' bo shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'dir spyo/
351a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pabyang chub sems dpa' khams gsum yang dag 'das gyur cing // nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston pa byed// rga dang na dang 'chi ba med kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag
351a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod mong gzugs kyi 'dam la thogs// til gyis 'khor lo lnga bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam// 'gro ba 'khrul pa'i rigs rgya 'dra shes gyur na// shes rab ldan pa mkha' la \u0f7f
351b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod cing // rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par mi spyod na// de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs su spongs/
351b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chags las rnam par grol ba bde gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// chags pa bcad nas 'jig rten chags pa med par 'gyur/
351b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyi ma skra gcan gza' bral lhang nger 'dug pa dang // me btang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsogs pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag par yongs rtogs shing /
351b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin mthong na// byed pa po yang ma dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin/ rgyal ba la ni
351b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lha rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spong pa ji ltar brtson// phung po khams la rdul rtsa ma brtson par mi byed pa// phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub sems
351b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa'i brtson// gang zhig chos 'od sprul dang sgyu ma 'drar zos na// som nyi med cing bslab la phyir zhing sbyor byed pa// sems can de ni rang nas theg zhugs rig par bya// sangs rgyas
351b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin// dpag ming mang por dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o mas// gnag rtsirtsa mtshams dang nags tshal phun sum tshogs mthong na/ 'di dag grong dang /
352a1(khri brgyad stong pa): grong khyer nye ba'i rtags snyam ste// dbugs phyin rnyed par gyur cing chom rkun 'jigs pa med// de bzhin byang chub yongs su tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi// shes rab
352a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol phyin 'di mnyam pa gang thob pa// de ni dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing 'jigs mang de// dgra bcoms la ma yon rkyen rtogs sa la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba/
352a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yis gal te shing dang nags rnams mthong na dadung ring // tsaM snya ma mthong rgyamatsho tshad ma ring ste// nye bar gyur pa'i rtags yin snyam du sum ni myeng // de ltar byang chub dum par
352a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab zhugs rig bya ste// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyan pa// rnam par 'dres pas mngon sum lung bstan ma gyur kyang // ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas byang chub reg pa
352a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur/ dpyod dus bzang 'byung rtswa dang lo ma yal ga rnams// lo ma 'bras bu me tog yang dag skyed par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di su yi lag thob pa// ring por mi thog
352a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin pa'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bung med snum pa'i sdug bsngal nyen gyur na// don dam bca' ba'i dus bab shes par bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgya
352a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i shes rab nyir// 'dun pachogatsang myur du byang chub gi par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol tshun mchog spyong chen la 'byor pa// gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang ni yongs su 'tsha ma/
352b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong // chos dbyings chos dang chos min rnams su mi mthong ste// mya ngan 'das la mi rig de ni shes rab gnas// gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste/
352b2(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang byang chub zhi mi tog/ rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// smra ba'i zla ba
352b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus// ston pas bar du gcod par 'gyur ba mang gsungs na// yon tan dga' ba rnams kyi bar du gcod gang lags// de la cung zad tsam zhig
352b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su brjod par bya// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol byin 'di yig bris tshe// spobs pa tha dang rnam pa du ma 'byung 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i don ma byas par glog bzhin myur du yang /
352b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// 'di bshad tshe na kha cig som nyi za 'gyur te// 'dren pas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang yongs ma brjod// rigs dang sa dang rus kyang
352b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su ma brjod ces// de ni nyan par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar rtsa ba thabs ni yongs su mi shes pas// blun po de dag yal la 'dab ma tshol bar 'gyur//
352b7(khri brgyad stong pa): glang po rnyed kyang glang po'i rjes ni tshol ba ltar/ shes rab pha rol phyin zos mdo 'tshal de bzhin no// dper na la la ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog rnyed nas drug cu pa dag tshol/
353a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byed ltar// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol phyin pa 'di rnyed nas// dgra bcom sa la byang chub tshol byed de bzhin no// bsti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing rnyed pa
353a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod 'gyur dang // lta ba'i sems dang bcas te khyim 'dris byed ldan zhing // chos btang nas ni chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba// lam bor lam gol song ba 'di ni bdud kyi las/
353a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag de yi tshe na chos kyi dam pa 'di// nyan par 'dun cing dad pa bskyed par gyur pa las// de dag chos smra bya ba min dang ldan rig nas// dga' ba med par gyur cing yid kyang mi bde bas/
353a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de yi tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang bar chad 'gyur ba rnam pa du ma ste// de tshe gang dag gos ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni 'dzin
353a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi byed// rin chen gang dag rin tang med cing dkon gyur pa// de dag la ni rtag tu dgra yang rab tu mang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dkon mchog rin chen la
353a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yang gnod pa byed pa'ang mang // theg pa gsar du zhugs pa sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed pa// de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur// phyogs
353a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu'i sangs rgyas 'di dag yongs su 'dzin dang ldan// ma zhig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa// de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim gro byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi
353b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyang // yum 'gyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgongs pa mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang // ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag 'di las/
353b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byung 'jig rten ston pa bskyed pa rgyal ba rnams kyi yum// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid // rang rgyal
353b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen// mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas
353b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung // chos nyid skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs// de phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs
353b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas mtshan gsol to// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyams dgar rab brten pa// stobs bcu rnams 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum
353b6(khri brgyad stong pa): las yongs 'don kyang // de dag nams kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med// dper na seng ge ri sul brten nas 'jigs med par// ri dgas phra mo skrag par byed cing sgra sgrog
353b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar mi yi seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas// mu stegs can mang skrag byed 'jigs med sgra yang sgrog/ dper na nam mkhar gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di skems par
354a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston// de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa// srid pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab tu ston// gzugs rnams mi
354a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing // 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing // gang la rnam par shes dang sems kyang mi mthong ba// 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin
354a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pas bstan// nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa// nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ba don 'di rtogs shig ltar// de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs
354a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pas bstan// mthong ba dper ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no// gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong // rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar// sangs rgyas
354a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la// rang gi yul las 'du ba thams cad sdud pa
354a6(khri brgyad stong pa): lhur/ byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi g.yo la// sangs rgyas sa yo yon tan gang yin thams cad sdung // gang zhig bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang brtan zhing /
354a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba// nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas// zil gyis mo non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob// dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i mun
354b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chag gyur la// mi gang ro 'am rtsa 'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa// chung dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngogs su phyin mo 'gyur// gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar gang
354b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag dang ldan dang ba rnyed gyur pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par spong mi byed// de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs gzung ste// mchog tu rmang byung bde gshegs byang chub myur
354b3(khri brgyad stong pa): du reg/ dper na la las rdza so ma gtang chu skyed na// nyam chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi// 'jigs pa med pa'i bde bar
354b4(khri brgyad stong pa): khyim du phyin par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du 'jig par 'gyur// dad pas shes rab de ni yongs su zin
354b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur/
354b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na// mi 'jig nor dang bcas pa ngogs su phyin por 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgoms kyang /
354b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon
355a1(khri brgyad stong pa): te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis bsten byas na// 'gyel ba'i 'jig
355a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu 'jig par 'gyur// de nyid thabs dang shes rab
355a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog gis yongs zin na// mi 'jigs de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang // lhag pa'i bsam pas
355a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// slob ma bzang po bla ma gus dang rab ldan pa// mkhas de dag gis dge bshes rtag tu bsten par bya// ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de
355a5(khri brgyad stong pa): las 'byung // de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la bsten to zhes// yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba de skad gsung //

355a7(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i las can dag la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang
355b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs 'dren don 'dod dang // gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs bzhin// grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gyon byed de// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyis//
355b2(khri brgyad stong pa): cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing yongs su gzung ba med// mi ldog g.yo ba med cing chos rnams 'khrugs pa meng // de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// som
355b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid gnyis 'gyod dang bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur pa// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste/
355b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par gyur med pa// don gcig nyid du rtogs nas phan byed snying brtser 'gyur// blo chung sems can tshogs sus 'di ni shes par
355b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur/ sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de/
355b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'od ni 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// nam mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang 'o/
355b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang phyogs bcu ji snyed rnams na'ang // tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ma phyin de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin
356a1(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid chos kun de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid de bye brag med/ bde gshegs byang chub tha dang chos dang bral gyur pa/
356a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa shes rab med na 'thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhig lus
356a3(khri brgyad stong pa): che dpag tshad brgya pa yod gyur tam// dpag tshad lnga bcur gyur pa'i gshog zang stobs med pa// de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir// bdag nyid mchongs na
356a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de na nyam nyes 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig
356a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ten rtag bsnyen kyang // thabs ming shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod pas// 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du/
356a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid dang brtul ba dang // za ba med cing drang la tshim 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa
356a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yon tan rgya mtsho nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol// mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad
356b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes bral zhing tshig dang ldan par smra// dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// mkhas pa dus gsum rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge ba bcu yi las lam mngon
356b2(khri brgyad stong pa): par brtson// zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rjes su ston// chos la gcig tu dga' zhing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan// 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gca' shing
356b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben zhing dag/ khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod rnyed pa 'dod ma yin// bdud kyi yul las 'das shes
356b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam med bsam gtan der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur na rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags//
356b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tsho ba'i longs spyod mi mthun 'tsho ba'i bsam pa med// drag shul spyod sngags bud med sbyor ba'i sngags mi byed// rtsa 'am 'dod phyir mi las las rnams len mi byed// rab tu dben pa shes rab
356b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan// kun mkhyen 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo'i yul
356b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' rnam par spangs// rang gi sa la ngogs med rtag tu rab 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs/
357a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams// zab cing rang bzhin mtshan ma med de rab zhig// shes rab kyis ni phung po brtags pas gting po rtogs/
357a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dper na mnga' yis rgya mtsho'i gting zug tshol dang mtshungs/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zab mos 'di lta bur// don dam gos pa med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa ste// gang na phung
357a3(khri brgyad stong pa): po med cing khams dang skye mched med// de la bsod nams sogs par ji ga la byed// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes pa zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad rnam rtog pa//
357a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni nyin gcig sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas rjes su rtogs// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du// sbyin pa sbyin dang
357a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims dri mang srung byed kyang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i mchod/ rjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang khams kyis char mo song // byang chub sems dpa' ga sa
357a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab mchog ba sgoms te// de las langs nas gol ba mang ba'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur sngon// dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med/
357a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gso ba dang ya ma brla dang snying po med par snang // de ltar spyad pa spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa bsod nam
357b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpag med yongs su 'dzin/ sangs rgyas rab tu bshad pa mdzad cing gzung mdzad cing // chos de thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad par shes bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por
357b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byas kyang // chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// gang zhig rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang / ming tsam zad par yongs su brjod pa'i chos de dag/ yongs
357b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrang pa dang po yis// snying po tshig min de med pas
357b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang tshig pa min// me lha phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la// me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med pas kyang
357b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi 'thob nus pa ma yin// de med pas kyang de 'thob nus pa ma yin no// sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung //
357b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de yang 'gags la de med par yang shing de med// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la de meng par yang byang chub med// chu yi thigs pa dang po chung
357b7(khri brgyad stong pa): du chung ngu yang // rim gyis thams rdza ma yongs su gang bar byed// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang mchog rgya ste// rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong
358a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa mtshan med smon pa med par chos spyod cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma la spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa par 'gro tshur 'gro yang // mtha'
358a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa meng pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag/ stobs bcus byang chub reg par lung bstan snyam mo sems// 'di la cing yang
358a3(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// dgon pa'i lam na lo nyes nad bcas 'jig rten rnams// mthong na skrag pa med cing bsgral ba'i go
358a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gyon te// phyi ma'i mur mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas// yongs su skyo ba'i yid kyi rdul tsam skyed pa med// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing // phung po 'di dag
358a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes// mnyam par ma gzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'jug/ bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yong mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan
358a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kun ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thub sgyu rtsal brtson byas tshul shes la// 'pho' dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma bsgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pha dang mngang
358a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chung mar bcas pa yongs 'dus nas// dgra byed mang po dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de yis dpa' zhing brtul phong skyes bu mang sprul nas// bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar/
358b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang // sems can khams rnams kun la snying rje chen po bskyed/ bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting 'dzin
358b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung rten de la chu yi phung po rten// de la sa chen 'di rten de la 'gro ba rten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// don
358b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mkha' la gnas pa yin par bsam par byed// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro la rab ston cing // sems can rnams kyi shes dang smon
358b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lam thabs stobs te// mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med// gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar
358b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skabs der ni mtshan ma bsgom par mi bya ste// mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la lhung mi 'gyur//
358b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgo spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma spyod ma yin// dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gyen du mda' 'phangs te// mda' gzhan dag gis
358b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gcig nas gcig tu long btags nas// snga ma'i mnga' des la ltung ba'i skabs mi byed// mi dri 'dod na mda' de sa la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa/
359a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam rgyu zhing // de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed// dper na dge
359a2(khri brgyad stong pa): slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam mkhar gnas te cho 'phrul zung dag rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston// de ni ldog pa med cing de la skye
359a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas med rgyu// 'gro ba dag la rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bya/
359a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bar nyams pa med cing skyo ba med// dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gnyis kas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing ji mi snyam// dus min rlung gis g.yang sa chen/
359a5(khri brgyad stong pa): por phul byas kyang // bdag nyid der ni g.yang du ltung bar 'gyur ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs
359a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gzung ste// chos rnams stong pa mtshan med sngon pa meng rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong // dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed
359a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong bar byed// deng pon de ni de la bde bar 'tsho mod kyi// 'on kyang gnyen bshes tshogs kyi sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rin chen gling song
359b1(khri brgyad stong pa): skye byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa// mya ngan 'das la reg par mngon par dga' mod kyi// 'on kyang sdug bsngal sems can sdug bsngal yid la 'byung //
359b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshong pa gang zhig grong khyer nas nas grong rdal dang // grong du bya ba'i phyir dang shes par phyir 'gro// der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la/ mkhas pa khyim du mi gnas lam
359b3(khri brgyad stong pa): la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin rang rgyal bcas pa'i nyen thos rnam grol shes// kun la byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba mkhas par 'gyur// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye
359b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes gnas ma yin// lam mkhas cho ga shes pa 'dus byas gnas mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'gro la byams pa rjes su 'brel byas nas// spong pa mtshan meng smon pa med pa'i ting /
359b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin spyod// gal te mya ngan 'das la reg byed de la med// de lta mod kyi den thob par byed kyang nus// dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing // de ni ming gis gdags par
359b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bya bar nus pa ste// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam par sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gos gdags nus rnam pa gzhan du min// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la/ byung
359b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' zab chos yongs su mi ston te// stong pa mtshan ma med dang mi ldog chos rnams kun// mi 'chad de ni lung bstan ma yin rig par bya// dgra bcoms dang rkyen gyis
360a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // 'gro la chos ston mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba// de ni mi ldog lung/
360a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcang smon lam btab// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis me yi phyung
360a3(khri brgyad stong pa): po ni de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nang mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis ni// 'on kyang rloms
360a4(khri brgyad stong pa): snyoms med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// byang chub sems dpa' bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems sam// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs
360a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis rnam pa grub med dam// pha rol lung bstan yin snyam rlom sems 'byung gyur na// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung rig par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs
360a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur nas// 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes brgyad kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing // 'di ni khyod kyi sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming yin zhe 'am// sbyangs
360a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sdoms ci 'dra brtson pa rnal 'byor ldan de la// khyod sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di zhes rjod byed de// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su
360b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing / bdag bstod gzhan la spong ba'i byang chub
360b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // byang chub ldan pa sems can smin byed ma gtogs
360b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal dag la 'dod med pa// 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yo sul// sbrul gyis
360b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i
360b5(khri brgyad stong pa): don brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin slob rnams la// 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam sems byed pa// de ni dgon pa'i spyod yul min zhes rgyal
360b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste/
360b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag nyams gzhan ma yin// de lta bas na mkhas pas nga rgyal bcom byas te// bsam pa drag pos byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// nad pa shin tu gso phyir
361a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sman pa bsten pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag/ pha rol
361a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin dang mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes su bstan// de dag nan tan sa 'di rjes su ston pa yin// rnam pa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyog
361a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang smon dang snang dang ston pa yin zhes bstan//
361a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtshan gyis stong // de ltar mtshan dang chos 'di thams cad sus shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan nyid med par rab shes na// de ltar spyod
361a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can zas dang 'dod la yongs su rtog byed cing // 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos
361a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis yod min stong pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis bdag la nam mkha'i mdud 'di btsongs// dper na dogs pas 'du shes kyis ni drug blangs pa// dug de lto bar song ba ma yin 'on kyang
361a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyel// de ltar byis pa bdag dang bdag gis khas blangs pa// 'du shes skyes pas 'chi yang rtag tu yod ma yin// ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang
361b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par dag par gsungs// 'di la nyon mongs nas ngag gang yang yod min par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin pas rtogs// 'dzam snang ma lus
361b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag na sems can ji snyed pa// de dag byams dang byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur sngo yang /
361b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su mthun byed na// bsod nams de la sbyin pa'i phung pos char mi bong// de phyir g.yel meng rtag tu shes rab
361b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// snying rje chen po bskyed cing sems can 'du shes med// de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu
361b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yul 'khor bsod nams don yod yongs su spyod// lha mi sems can ring nas ngan song gsum 'brel ba// yongs su 'grol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// shes rab pa
361b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol phyin pa nyin mtshan brtson byed pa// lam yang 'di ni sems can khams kyi 'bab stegs ston// mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa yi rin chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga'
361b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba las// rnyed ma thag tu stor te bag med gyur pas na// stor bas sdug bsngal rtag tu rin chen mngon 'dod pa// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen mtshungs pa yi// shes rab pha rol
362a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas 'dzin par byed cing mi phyed na// rjes su 'dzin par byed cing myur du dbang du 'gyur// 'od zer 'phreng bas mun pas
362a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dkrugs pa'i mun nag kun// sel bar byed cing sprin meng mkha' la nyi shar na// srog chags 'byung po'i srin bu me khyer thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis non//
362a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa lha thibs sel byed cing // 'gro ba kun dang dgra bcom rang rgyal zil gyis non// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa
362a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan med yongs spyad phyir// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can dga' byed na// thabs thob gyur
362a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nas rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos// de ltar spyad pa spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni de lta na yang sems can mang phan
362a6(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas spos ci dgos// de yi tshen bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan sdug bsngal nyam thag mthu chung yid mi bde// de ltar byang chub sems
362a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes// 'jigs pa ston phyir phyogs rnams bsreg cing skar mnga' gtong // gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa
362b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog don lta// rtag tu lus dang sems ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar gyur// de la nag po'i rtsa lag grags rnyeng ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing /
362b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshun mi mthun khrod pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa// de yi tshon bdud ni dga' zhing mgu byar 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni rang du 'gyur// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za'ang
362b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bar 'gyur// de gnyis rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de ni bdud rnams dga' zhing bdud la thub mi 'gyur// lung bstan
362b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma tho ba byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig/ lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par phyir yang go cha bgo dgos
362b5(khri brgyad stong pa): so// sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ de snyam sems shing ma legs snyam pa'i blo skyed de// so sor 'chag par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la// bral bar
362b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob la bslab pa gang du slob med cing // slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs la// bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di
362b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis mi rtog pa// de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bslab 'dir de ltar shes// de ni bslab pa nyams dang tshul khrims 'chal pa
363a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhar mi 'gyur// de ni nyes par byed cing sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// bslab pa mkhas shing dmigs pa med par gyur pas slob/ mkhas pa 'od byed nam/
363a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis shes rab de ltar spyod// dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang skyed mi byed// nyi ma bar snang la ni 'gro bar byed pa na// 'od zer snang bas mdun na mun pa mi gnas bzhin//
363a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab pha rol phyin pa bslab par byas rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pa
363a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par 'gyur// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags nas dbang po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yod pa zad par 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa
363a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nyan thos yon tan dang // rang rgyal yon tan kun la bslab
363a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par gyur pa rnams// de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi skyed de// 'di ni bdag gi bslab bya yod snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi// sems
363a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang bas// stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal nas tshad gzung rung // rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de ltar min// dge ba don gnyis thar 'dod sems
363b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can ji skad pa/ kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed/
363b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med par spos med yongs shes la// shes rab bsam pa thag pas byang chub mi tshol ba// rnal 'byor
363b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// nam mkha'i khams dang khams gnyis tha dad 'gyur du ni// de dang de la gang phyir ces kyang bye brag med// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas
363b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' yang // nam mkha' mtshungs shing dran pa nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du// skye bo 'di dag mgu bya mi sems bya ba med//
363b5(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yo sgyu sna tshogs rab tu ston pa de yang mthong // 'on kyang de la lus med sems med ming yang med// de bzhin shes rab spyod pa rnams kyang 'di snyam du// byang chub sangs rgyas
363b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gro ba yongs su sgrol mi sems// rang gi skye ba bya ba sna tshogs ldan pa'ang ston// sgyu ma lta bur rnam par rtog pa med par spyod// dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa
363b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed de ni ci zhig bya snyam du yang sems mi skyed// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan bzo
364a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bo mkhas pas shing gi 'khrul 'khor byas// skyes pa bud myed 'dra ste bya ba thams cad byed// de bzhin shes rab spyod ma las byang chub sems dpa' yang
364a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed// phyogs bcu'i 'jig
364a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed kyang // yon tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng bas yongs su brjod par mdzad// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing na sems can rnams// de kun bdud du gyur
364a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par yongs su brtag bzung ste// ba smra nyag ma re re ji snyed sprul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas la bar chad bye mo nus// rnam pa zhis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
364a5(khri brgyad stong pa): skyobs ldan pa/ thub par dka' zhing bdud bzhis bskyed par mo nus te// stong par gnas dang sems can yongs su mo gtong dang // de skad sgras bzhin byed dang bde ga
364a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byin brlabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di// 'chang tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing // bsam pa zag pas bsgrub par mngon
364a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du brtson byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir mngon zhugs rig par bya// de bzhin nyid kyi gnas su chos dbyings nyer mi 'gro// dper na bar snang sprin ni gnas med gnas pa
364b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin/ rig sngags 'chang ba dmigs med nags sems mkha' 'gro tshe// me tog shing phyir sngags kyi stobs kyi byin rlabs byed// de ltar spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal/
364b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba rtog par byeng dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chad par byed dang chos nyid mthong ba mi dmigs pa// 'di ni ni 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin/
364b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra bcom rnam mthar ma gtogs par// gnas pa 'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa yi// gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa// ji snyed kun gyi
364b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mchog dang gong na med pa yin// 'dab chags nam mkhar gnas kyang lhung bar 'gyur ma yin// nya ni chun gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan
364b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs dag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur// sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog 'gro gang 'dod pas// chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin bya zhing // phan mdzad
364b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi gnas pa mchog 'dir sten cig dang // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg 'gyur// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa ji snyed kun gyi mchog
364b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gong na med// mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir spobs// chos mdzad dam pa 'di ni gter gyi phul du byung // 'jig
365a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rten dag na sangs rgyas rigs kyi bde skying mdzod// 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di la byung ste chos dbyings pad mi 'gyur/
365a2(khri brgyad stong pa): shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa// de dag thams cangs la yang dag byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skyo ba med cing yongs su ma nyams/
365a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa ji snyed dang // 'jig rten kun na lha dang bde skyid chos yod pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab rnams
365a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang zad pa myed cing 'phel ba med// sems can za ma 'bring dang mchog gyur ji snyed pa// de kun ma rig las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal
365a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung // 'khrul 'khor zad pa med cing ma rig 'phel ba med// ye shes tshul sgo thabs kyi rtsa baji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // na
365a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa zang pa 'am 'phel ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di// shes rab kyis na
365a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byung med zad med rtogs pa de// dper na sprin gyis sgrib med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// ma rig 'gebs pa bsal nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa dag ni bsam gtan bzhir
365b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas kyang // rten par byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan bzhi po 'di dag rten yin zhing // thob par 'gyur nas byang chub dam pa mchog kyang 'jog/ shes/
365b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab mchog thob pa dag bsam gtan gnas pa myong // gzugs med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi po rnams kyang myong // bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub mchog la phan byed gyur// byang chub sems
365b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' zag pa zad phyir slob pa min// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan ma med// de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su
365b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang skye ste// 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung zhing // dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa'i// lha yul lha yi khang pa dam pa rnyed gyur cing // mthong nas de yis der na
365b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yul rnams yongs bzung ba// de dag gnas par mi byed phyir yang 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'chang ba// rnal 'byor brtson pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin
365b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te gos pa med// chu la pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas// sems can yongs su smin par bya dang zhing byung dang // pha rol phyin 'di
365b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su rdzogs bya ma gtogs par// bdag nyid chen po gzugs med khams su skye mi byed// byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin rnams nyams par 'gyur// dper na mi zhig rin chen gter
366a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams rnyed gyur cing // de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskyed pa ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan zhig na de dag yongs blangs shing // blangs na khyim du bcug ste chags par
366a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas bsam gtan bzhi// ting 'dzin zhi ba dga' bde sbyin byed thob gyur la/ bsam gtan bde dang bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob
366a3(khri brgyad stong pa): btang ste// 'gro la snying brtse ldan pa phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin bsam gtan gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo skyeng
366a4(khri brgyad stong pa): na mnyam par ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang
366a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson gyur kyang // dgra bcom rang rgyal theg bral byang chub sems dga' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya// sems can rnams dag
366a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gang zag gzhan gyi phyir// brtson 'grus pha rol brtson zhing rnam par rgyu// dper na bran mo bum thogs dbang med rje bo'i dbang // de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang
366a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gis 'gro// spyo ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdegs kyang rung // bran mo rje bo la ni zlog pa'i tshig mi smra// bdag la des na gnod pa byas su 'ong snyam nas// shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis
366b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs pas zil gyis nom// de bzhin byang chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun la bran myur de bzhin gnas par bya// lung gi yon tan rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs mi
366b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed shing las ma byung ba yis shing de bsregs pa bzhin// bdag gi bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson// bu gcig
366b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la ma nI rim gro byed pa ltar// bsam pa zag pas byed de skyo mang gnas pa bzhin// sems can don dang zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
366b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems shing // skyo bo'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de ni g.yel med brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson// byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas bskal pa bye grangs la/
366b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te ring bar 'du shes sdug bsngal byang chub bsgrub/ chos sgrub byed pa'i tshe na rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// de tshe brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// zhi po bla na meng bathob
366b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya snyam ste// byang chub mchog tu sems sbyang thog mar bskyed byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du de la yid gcig gnas byed pa// mkhas pa gsal ba brtson 'grus brtsams par
366b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rig par bya// gal te la la 'di skad ri rab ri bo shig la// phyi nas byang chub mchog thob bya zhes smras pa las// gal te skyo ba'i blo skyes ched du byed gyur na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'
367a1(khri brgyad stong pa): le lo rnyed par 'gyur// ci ste cung zad 'di lta ci smos blo skyes te// skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
367a2(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring por ma thogs 'dren par byang chub thob par 'gyur// yongs su smin par byas la 'gro ba'i don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag yid kyis
367a3(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson byed na// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa le lo rnyed 'gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnams bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes
367a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med 'du shes rnam par log nas chos gnyis mi spyod pa// 'di ni byang chub ma nyams mchog zhing tshol ba yi// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs/
367a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan las ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rtsub thos gyur nas// su smra su thos gang nas su yi gang btang zhes// ma lus mgu byed byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de// bzod pa'i pha rol
367a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin dang ldan pa mdzangs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum rin rkyen bkang ste 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas
367a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa// sbyin pa'i phung pos de yi bsod nams char mi phod// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis
367b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yas// sems can rnams la dad pa'i chos rab sgrog par byed// bzod pa mkhas la 'jig rten 'din dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems can la/
367b2(khri brgyad stong pa): las tsan ngan sdom bkang ste// bla ma 'phangs pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang // gzhan zhig me mngag mgo la 'thor ba gnyis ka la// de yos mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i
367b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid ni bskyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngos na// dpa' bo bzod pas 'jig rten
367b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kun na dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can khams kyi bzod kun zil gyis non// babod byed 'odi snyam du yang sems ni bskyeng byed ste// sems dmyal dung 'gro gshin rje
367b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang // 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis mi 'dod gnod myong na// byang chub chung ngu ci phyir nga bzod mi bya snyam// lhag dbyig mtshon dang gsang dang bcing dang rdeg
367b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag gis bzod snyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas/
367b7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhi ba 'dod pa rnams ni khrims kyis byung ba yin// stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom pa'i bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjes su 'jug/ sems
368a1(khri brgyad stong pa): can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub sngo// gal te rang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub 'dod skyed na// tshul khrims 'chal cing tshul mkhas de bzhin spyod pa
368a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyams// ci ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs sto na// 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung med pa/
368a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni yon tan chos don ldan pa'i tshul khrims yin// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pa ste gsungs/
368a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod la// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste// sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed pa
368a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod cing rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'did skyed na// de tshe tshul khrims
368a6(khri brgyad stong pa): skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyad de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs sngol// de yis rlom sems med de
368a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag bstod mi byed cing // nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs spangs pa// tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas byang chub sems dpa' brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa'
368b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces// sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'tshal// tshul khrims nyams shing de
368b2(khri brgyad stong pa): la yongs dag tshul khrims med// gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom pa ci phyir med// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom
368b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// sems can dag pa gang zhig 'di lha'i khrims ldan pa// sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba mang ba yin// mgo
368b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med yam bad+mar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gto
368b5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing zhen pa'i sems med na// de las phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos// gal te sar sna byed pa de ni gnas min te// bdag dang bdag gir dngos por 'du shes 'dod chags 'gyur//
368b6(khri brgyad stong pa): blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ka la yod// ser sna yi dgas gnas su skye bar byed pa ste// ci ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can
368b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dbul zhes na// gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong // gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de
369a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byar min// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba sbyin byin na// srid pa gsum gyi sems can ji snyed bsam byas te// de dag kun la sbyin 'di byin par/
369a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur cig sems// de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu sngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos por gnas par byed pa med// de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med// de ltar
369a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gtong ba mkhas la thams cad gtong ba ste// chung ngu gtang la dpag tu med pa mang por 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// yongs su brtag pa gzung ste de dag
369a4(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyis// 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa thabs
369a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por yi rang nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs sngon// yongs su sngo bas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis non//
369a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang // rin chen bai DUR+Ya gcig de kun zil gyis non// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rjes su yi rang byang chub sems
369a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpas zil gyis non// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin na// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po 'phangs med na// de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel
369b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur te// sbyin meng zla ba yar ngo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pas yi dgas 'gro ba gcod// dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad /
369b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gcod rnam par rgya che longs spyod mtha' yas yangs pa 'thob// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can sbyin pas yongs smin byed // khrims kyis dud 'gro 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo spong
369b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dus rnams kun tu mi khom brgyad kyang rnam par sbyang // bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/
369b4(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bang mdzod ye shes mtha' yas thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan spang ba
369b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dor rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes na// ngan song gsung po'i khams gsum dag las shin tu 'das/
369b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi yi 'dren pa'i 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas na// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston// chos ni yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de// yongs dag
369b7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing dang sems can dag pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin// byang chub lam 'di
370a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab bstan phyir brjod pa ste// 'jig rten dag na nad gso byed pa sman pa'i mchog/ ming ni yon tan thams cad sdud pa'i byang chub lam// lam 'di sem
370a2(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyis ni thob gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
370a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dri
370a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol bar 'dod pa'i
370a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
370a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'
370a7(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du nges/ shes rab
370b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ ji ltar yongs su btsal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
370b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ston shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba nA/ lus la cheng cher mi 'dzin/ srog la mi lta/ rnyeng
370b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas yongs su btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu
370b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa na/ bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi
370b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang /
370b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyin mo yang la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yod la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / che ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song zhig/ nang dang phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig
370b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yos su ma blta bar song zhig/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'o ga dang / phyogs mtshams su'ang ma blta bar song zhig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas
371a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
371a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig/ gang las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las/
371a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob
371a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bo de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems
371a5(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems
371a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di sad ces smras so// rtag tu ngu legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te
371a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyang la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o//
371b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/ dngos pa yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar/
371b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngon po med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gas
371b3(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar bsgrubs na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu
371b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa zos pa 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la/ rigs kyi
371b5(khri brgyad stong pa): khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar byas te/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zos pa 'di ni bdag gi
371b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
371b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su
372a1(khri brgyad stong pa): skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod
372a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis
372a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis
372a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / s+thA dang / dri dang / ro dang / ga
372a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten pa dang / bsnyen
372a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa po skyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/
372a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen
372b1(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul
372b2(khri brgyad stong pa): so sor rtog par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir/
372b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ brag cha
372b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lta bu mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring por ma thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nga
372b5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod bdud kyi las la sems shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la
372b6(khri brgyad stong pa): brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi
372b7(khri brgyad stong pa): myo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtab tu ngus/ spang la rjes su bstan pa
373a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so
373a2(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam nas/ des phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de sme zhing 'dug go// des phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am
373a3(khri brgyad stong pa): lnga 'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du/ lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed/
373a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi sbyad/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed
373a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan
373a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
373a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo //
373b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so
373b2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
373b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis
373b4(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus 'di dang / spo ba 'di dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad
373b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lnga brgya na spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'o bas rim pa bdun dang shing ta la'i 'phreng rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor
373b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing
373b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gos ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyams ming ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna dun
374a1(khri brgyad stong pa): legs par byas shing bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mnga' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshang dang ldan pa/ mda'
374a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang
374a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rin po che'i za gu byung ba mnga' yab cig shos gzhan dang 'brel ba/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis
374a4(khri brgyad stong pa): btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra
374a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du / dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan la ying du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag ce
374a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' zhing dga' mgur spong ngo // grong khyer de'i khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang ha cang mi dro bas gang bdag yod do// chu la sngon gyi rnam par
374a7(khri brgyad stong pa): smin pas grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyi grung ga yod de/ derisems cad dag zhugs nas rtsa dga' ning rab tu rgya'o// chu thams cad kyang me tog ut+pal dang / ku mr-i ta dang / brna
374b1(khri brgyad stong pa): po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim pa'i ngang dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams da yod pa'i mcho/
374b2(khri brgyad stong pa): garigs las/ den med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer nga'i nangan sbed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkrazhing bstan thug pas
374b3(khri brgyad stong pa): stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod pa/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pal
374b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkri zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag thams
374b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po/
374b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod
374b7(khri brgyad stong pa): do rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran da dang / gzhan sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing
375a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs su gcad pa med de/ 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de/
375a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gi sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che
375a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig
375a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yod do// khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa/
375a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal ba ni yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang / rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba
375a6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag
375a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum ni bai DUR+Ya las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi la ni ke ke ru la byas pa'i/
375b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bye ma brdal bsgra/ rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them smras them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyang brgyad yod de/ themasas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'jam/
375b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da dang / ut+pal dang pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / dang ngur dang /
375b3(khri brgyad stong pa): khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byon to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams
375b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan ngan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor
375b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /
375b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga'
375b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste dga' mgur spyod cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha
376a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang / grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
376a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba/
376a3(khri brgyad stong pa): steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shaM ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar
376a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sgo lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing / sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug
376a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag de lta bur gus par
376a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / mi dang / srog chags brgya zag
376a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mang po/ sros chags stong phrag mang po/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po chags par dag las/ la la ni klog slob/ la la na 'dzin/ la la ni 'chang / kha cig na thos/
376b1(khri brgyad stong pa): la ni lung nod / la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtog par byed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung
376b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i
376b3(khri brgyad stong pa): drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu do na yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag
376b4(khri brgyad stong pa): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs
376b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma gcad par
376b6(khri brgyad stong pa): song zhig dang / ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de thos nas
376b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi
377a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
377a2(khri brgyad stong pa): po rtag tu du yang / gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam
377a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams
377a4(khri brgyad stong pa): cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyang bo nyid la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
377a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad rgya ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya/
377a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma shes pa sel /
377a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog 'akram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngas po mo sgrub pa/
377b1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad
377b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
377b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang / 'bru dang / 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mkhengs pa zhes bya
377b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya
377b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgring ba
377b6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i
377b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
378a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
378a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
378a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
