378a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
378a5(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag meng par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya
378a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol
378a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga dzin dang / chos gam ma 'ang byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rirab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i hong
378b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par mazhen pa zhes bya
378b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas
378b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
378b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung bar mdzad de/ tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs so// rigs kyi bu nged kyis
378b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal to// yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di
378b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag thob nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngos
378b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
379a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang
379a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
379a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tha/
379a4(khri brgyad stong pa): named pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan
379a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog
379a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin
379a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// 'phangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
379b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par 'chang bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungs 'di skad ces gsol te/
379b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
379b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su gzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so//
379b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu de na khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
379b5(khri brgyad stong pa): po chos 'phags la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thong bzhin du thogs shing / bde ba'i
379b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
379b7(khri brgyad stong pa): cad phul yang / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes
380a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin
380a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa de dag gos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyung nas mi sdang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/
380a3(khri brgyad stong pa): langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bkung snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma ma
380a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa
380a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzin pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas nges bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis
380a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ma phyin nas/ de bzhin ga shegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du/
380a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bathud cis don 'di tshad nim snyam pa/ nganas byang chu mams pa sa ma ma na pa ga tung/ byang chub thams dpa' sems dpa' tshan pa rgyas 'dags la gis/
380b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
380b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ bdag bkur sting bu ba'i gos rin po 'ang
380b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gser ma/ nor bu'am/ mu tig nam/ bai n+yAr+tha lam/ dung ngas/ man shel las/ byi 'am/ dngul las/ sa le sbram mas/ me rtogags/ spos sas/ me tog 'drus
380b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ngam byug pa 'am/ gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul
380b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa'ang mi skye'o snyam sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i
380b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yon tan dag dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas/ mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de'i grong bar dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar
380b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de btsongs la/
381a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang / 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/
381a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod mi su 'dod ces
381a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir
381a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
381a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis
381a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/
381a7(khri brgyad stong pa): der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed
381b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis/
381b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su 'dod/ su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang
381b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dri gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ byang chub
381b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni rnying pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo// de nas lha'i
381b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang ba lhag pa'i bas
381b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha
381b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
382a1(khri brgyad stong pa): smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir
382a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus
382a3(khri brgyad stong pa): btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus
382a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la mis ni
382a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba med kyis/ kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang byang chub
382a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo bi rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis
382a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems
382b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyong gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'ang
382b2(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du tse 'dang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su gtang ba kho bo la byin ci
382b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po zlogs nas lag pa g.yon pa phug ste khrag gzugs so// brla g.yas pa sha meng par
382b4(khri brgyad stong pa): btogs nas rus pa gcig tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
382b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas/ rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid/
382b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta bu'i na cha dag byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la ba der song ste
382b7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus
383a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya rtag tu ngus bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la bcings te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa
383a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa'
383a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur
383a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sti bya bar 'dod pa/ khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
383a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems
383a6(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha'
383a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
383b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge
383b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / blan med pa yang dag
383b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab
383b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
383b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin
383b6(khri brgyad stong pa): na/ gcig lta tsa smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti
383b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai rUrma 'am/ dngul lam me tog gamabadug pa 'am/ spos sam/ me tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/
384a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/
384a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod kyang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa
384a3(khri brgyad stong pa): babaskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
384a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yid dam la brnyed pa ni legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
384a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/
384a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gi bya ba med kyis/ kho bos khyod sang ba'i phyir
384a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa spongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la spras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la

384b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la na lha'i dbang pa dzin pa blang bar gyim shig/ lha'i dbang po dang nyid thas pa ma
384b3(khri brgyad stong pa): byin gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gos bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par
384b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo mang par mkhyen cen/ bden par dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon bzhin du rgyur ga

385a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol mo'i cha byang mang po dag stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal pa'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/

385a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas bu mo de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu drang su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu ded ltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/
385b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o sgrol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems/
385b2(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid bcings la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
385b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchod pa brgya bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su'ang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing
385b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yid mi bde nas/ mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ des nga'i lus 'tshong bar 'dod pa lus nyo bam rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/
385b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
385b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de las rag las pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang /
385b7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der/ mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang
386a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu ngas yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du myur nogs smras pas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag ga lag pa
386a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phug nas khrag gzugs/ baR+Sha'i sha btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzags pa bdag khang
386a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi 'di co'i slad du 'di ltar bdag nyid lan tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thang du mchis nas 'di skad bkyis so//
386a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzugs pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa/
386a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te/ nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'disas
386a6(khri brgyad stong pa): du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o zhes mtshanas/
386a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis 'di sad bgyis te/ rigs kyi bungs khyod la yon tan tsa rnam pa 'am/ khyang par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis ma
386b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khyab pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
386b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag zos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu
386b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dka' bar bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la
386b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mchod pa mi bgyi/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di

387a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dga' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las skye
387a4(khri brgyad stong pa): brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byeng na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gis bu mo

388a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos kyi khri la 'dug pa 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de
388a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba dang bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtsa gcig yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag shing

388a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag mnyam du shing rta de las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas
388a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems
388a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gis dra ngas
388b1(khri brgyad stong pa): g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhin nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron me'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs
388b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nAg po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po
388b3(khri brgyad stong pa): che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs pa de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la/ bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ lang /
388b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
388b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog
388b6(khri brgyad stong pa): man da ra dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo // lha'i
388b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod
389a1(khri brgyad stong pa): lha'i bu stod phrag dum dag dang / rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man dar dang / tsan dan gyi phyem dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor/
389a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
389a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa
389a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
389a5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba yin na khyod mi shes samA/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'ang
389a6(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces smras so// ko& sho ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/

389b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka' 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs
389b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang
389b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gsar dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag
389b4(khri brgyad stong pa): las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
389b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag tu dus me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi
389b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
389b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
390a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/
390a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'o steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to// gser dang dngul gyi me tog nam mkha'
390a3(khri brgyad stong pa): la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems
390a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyin
390a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar maH
390a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
390a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
390b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags la dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ca
390b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
390b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa na'ang / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams
390b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi
390b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig
390b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/
390b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
391a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub
391a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal na/ zhes
391a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
391a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyog
391a5(khri brgyad stong pa): su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis skang thos nas/ shar phyogs gal ba der logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams
391a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ nges bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung
391a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig
391b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bgyis te/ ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdun du de bzhin
391b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa'
391b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji
391b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar gtams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes
391b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
391b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs dbyung ba
391b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
392a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs
392a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa'
392a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags
392a4(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon
392a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'tshal cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/
392a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang ba nung pa bdag la bshang du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rtag par rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad curtsa lnga pa'o//
392a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di
392b1(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
392b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba 'am/
392b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gsheg
392b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o// rigs kyi ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba 'am
392b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
392b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de
392b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin cing bang yin pa 'di ni bzhin nyid gcig paste/ rigs
393a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das
393a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba za ma la/ nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes
393a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems te/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho
393a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'am byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyal chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu nya mas gdungs shing
393a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes bskyed gyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos
393a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ slar mngon par zhen par byed pa de
393a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzung bar rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhung par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can
393b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dper na mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/
393b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am/ bzung ba
393b3(khri brgyad stong pa): med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma sprul pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba
393b4(khri brgyad stong pa): med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du nga
393b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa
393b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig mthong ba las/ sad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud / rtag tu
393b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda' 'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te
394a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur
394a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag pa ji ba bzhin du bstan par mi shes pa de dag ni/ mi dang mtshan gyi sku dang gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa
394a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / bzhud par rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod po'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par dong ba/ 'dong pa
394a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu
394a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lnga bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi la mo lta bu'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang /
394a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag chos nyid la'ang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin
394a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog go// gang
394b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//
394b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen
394b3(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang
394b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin mod kyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang /
394b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhi la rag las pa yin te brten nas byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen de
394b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i
394b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon spyod pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa
395a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sngon gyi 'dzin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grung bar 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon
395a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'grub par yang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na po wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro// gang du'ang mi 'opho ste
395a3(khri brgyad stong pa): brten nas 'byung ba rgya la rig las/ rkyen la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste/ pi wang gi log pa la rten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyad la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mo de las skyes
395a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/ pi wang de las sgra byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung
395a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgra brag la/ sgra de 'gag pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/
395a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag lus pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bdu mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin
395a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu meng pa'ang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las 'byung ba yin to// de ni gang nas kyang
395b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos
395b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de
395b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / zabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
395b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos
395b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
395b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur
395b7(khri brgyad stong pa): to/ dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po bzhi dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
396a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag tu ngu la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag
396a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cag gis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to//
396a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bus g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di/
396a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byon mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad thos mi
396a5(khri brgyad stong pa): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig
396a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rdul med cing drim dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dga' ba dang rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag
396a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzung pa mang sa bstan pa 'ang rjes pas/ sems can 'di skad kyi na byas par gyur pa ni bdag sas rnyeng pa legs
396b1(khri brgyad stong pa): par rnyed do// 'ang nyid kyis bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i ma pa mchog gis dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir bcos mi byas
396b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag ni tha tsam meng par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur rosnyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa dadang ldan pas tal bdud byam durnam mangs
396b3(khri brgyad stong pa): la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so//
396b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog man
396b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod yongs su gzung ba yin te/
396b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir/ ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed
396b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka' 'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub
397a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor / mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
397a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang nam ring bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gi lus khyod la dbul lo// des bdag gi lus phul nas/ byang
397a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi bdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug sa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
397a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang ldan cig tu sangs rgyas
397a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bkur stir bgying / de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs
397a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyod kho bos blang ngo // bu mo
397a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gis spras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa zag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems
397b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing d+ha lA brgya'ang brgyan nas/ de thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
397b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas
397b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad
397b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su gtang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas na/
397b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
397b6(khri brgyad stong pa): spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'odadi lta bu gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris
397b7(khri brgyad stong pa): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems
398a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu la byin no// de nas/
398a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par 'gyur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
398a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi chal/ 'din ma legs kyis/
398a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo//
398a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'
398a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin grangs ma dpag tu med pa dag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnus par d+har te/ byang chub sems dpa'
398a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tsho ba'i rtog pa ma byung / grol brkam pa ma skyes te/
398b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos
398b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyikhri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri ba shams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la/ me tog sna
398b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston
398b4(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur ba de legs par byug par bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i
398b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
398b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra zos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhags bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong
398b7(khri brgyad stong pa): khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu
399a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mgu zhing / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad/
399a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis spras pa bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par
399a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi
399a4(khri brgyad stong pa): snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yang mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i
399a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mo snang bar byas nas/ kun tu 'tshol na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
399a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus las khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas
399a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la/
399b1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig pa ni sa'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i gnyis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cor yang marung ngo snyam po//
399b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon non bzungs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu ngus nas/ rang gi khrag gosas phyogs khor lar yub tu chag chag ga nga
399b3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi nu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon rnon po thangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas
399b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chas chag bta ba ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chang bya ba'i glags rnyeng par mi 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas
399b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rtag tu du dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di 'ang
399b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yi ngas la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / blan med pa yang dag par /
399b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dbab tu meng ba'as
400a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thar par bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thams
400a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so// lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri ngam pargya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar dris khyab go/
400a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam
400a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
400a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gos kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so//
400a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi
400a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag bdar ni byas chag chag ni btab na bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
400b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'alags chos 'chang pa la gtor bar bya ba dang / matog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po
400b2(khri brgyad stong pa): brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man nga ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa
400b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par gyis shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig ces
400b4(khri brgyad stong pa): des de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba kha la stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs
400b5(khri brgyad stong pa): der me tog bkram pa byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
400b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste
400b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
401a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs
401a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i dge sbyong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu
401a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa ston pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas
401a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom
401a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
401a6(khri brgyad stong pa): khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab
401a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/
401b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas
401b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/
401b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang
401b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas
401b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid
401b6(khri brgyad stong pa): do/ nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
401b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab
402a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig/
402a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas
402a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du
402a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med po zhes
402a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
402a6(khri brgyad stong pa): cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
402a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
402b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor
402b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
402b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
402b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
402b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis ma
402b6(khri brgyad stong pa): khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to//
402b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
403a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgro 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang
403a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
403a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bltas te/ tshul 'di lta
403a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper nang ltang stong gsum gyi stong chen
403a5(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bdun gyis bltas nas/ tshul 'di nyid
403a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ming 'di nyid dang / yi ga 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / zos pa rgya mtshol
403a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon
403b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sum du gyur pa de dang de dag tu skye ste/ zan rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ des mi lom pa thams cad ni spangs/ ngal baphun sum
403b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
403b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab tu rom
403b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu byon pa 'di la spyad par byer/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
403b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yid dag par yongs su gathong ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gnan la 'ang rnam
403b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'odang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bkran
403b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya/ lung nong par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis glegs pamachen po la man
404a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
404a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam par mang pos bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed
404a3(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdam ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin
404a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nam kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol
404a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod
404a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas so// kun dga' bo de lta
404a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bas na nga lta nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis 'phangs pa dang / dang pa dang / gus par byas pa de bzhin du/ nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
404b1(khri brgyad stong pa): la'ang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du
404b2(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su gtad ngo // rjes su yongs su gtad ngo // kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten du ji srong du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o//
404b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang
404b4(khri brgyad stong pa): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
404b5(khri brgyad stong pa): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar mo'i 'phreng
404b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i
404b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig
405a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o//
405a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang
405a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
405a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kA t+ya ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha dang /
405a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
405a6(khri brgyad stong pa): khri brgyad stong ba las/ yongs su gtad ba'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi brgyad srong rdzogs sa/
405a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tri dang / su rats+tsha bi d+hi dang / bu chen gyi lo tsa ba dan de ye shes snga la sogs pas bsgyur rtsing chus te gtan la phab pa'o//
